data.message: Please please never change the advert!! It's the only thing that can be maintained -we all know family unfortunately changes as we get older- so we need the Coke advert to stay the same!!! It brings back lovely memories every year!!! John Lewis and the super markets can compete for the Christmas add, but they'll never have the impact of the Coca Cola one!! Holidays are coming!!!!! 🎄🎄 have a great Christmas!
